actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution to require the Special Prosecution Force to make available to the public a report on all admissible evidence it has involving Richard M. Nixon in offenses against the United States.

summary.text: Directs the Office of the Special Prosecution Force to, in addition to existing responsibilities, prepare and publish a full and complete report stating in detail all evidence in its possession which sets forth or contains any information concerning any involvement of Richard M. Nixon in any offense against the United States. Requires such report to be printed and made available to the Congress no later than ninety days after the date of the adoption of this resolution.

titles.title: Joint resolution to require the Special Prosecution Force to make available to the public a report on all admissible evidence it has involving Richard M. Nixon in offenses against the United States.
